rules.description: Change caps_lock to ⌃+⌥+⌘+⇧ key, or Escape
Use regular function keys in terminal
CAPS_LOCK to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or ESCAPE (If Alone)

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
